hypothesis_content.title: BTC 20/50 EMA Golden Cross Momentum Acceleration
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC's 20-day EMA crosses above its 50-day EMA during a NEUTRAL or BULL regime, and the 24-hour volume exceeds its 10-day average by 15%, a sustained uptrend will follow, with price appreciating at least 8% over the next 5 trading days without a 4% daily drawdown.
hypothesis_content.rationale: EMA crosses in neutral/bull regimes signal shifting medium-term momentum. Volume confirmation filters out false breaks and suggests institutional or strong retail participation. The $85k level acts as a recent consolidation breaker, increasing trend persistence probability.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-day EMA > BTC 50-day EMA (cross occurred within last 24h)
Current regime is NEUTRAL or BULL (confidence > 60%)
BTC price > $85,000 (confirms above key psychological level)
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of signals result in immediate 4% drawdown before achieving 3% gain, or median 5-day return is statistically indistinguishable from zero.
